headline: Mohawk Industries: Even Though Shares Are Cheap, Caution Is Justified
summary: Mohawk Industries, Inc. struggles with revenue declines and macro headwinds despite cost-cutting efforts. Click for my updated look at MHK stock ahead of earnings.

headline: What Analyst Projections for Key Metrics Reveal About Mohawk Industries (MHK) Q2 Earnings
summary: Evaluate the expected performance of Mohawk Industries (MHK) for the quarter ended June 2025, looking beyond the conventional Wall Street top-and-bottom-line estimates and examining some of its key metrics for better insight.

headline: Mohawk Gears Up to Post Q2 Earnings: What's in Store for the Stock?
summary: MHK's second-quarter 2025 results are likely to reflect soft demand, rising costs and ongoing restructuring efforts.
